trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-ItemPropertyValue
trans-unit.target: Get ItemPropertyValue

trans-unit.source: Get-ItemPropertyValue
trans-unit.target: Get ItemPropertyValue

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for one or more properties of a specified item.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定项的一个或多个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路径 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Get-ItemPropertyValue** gets the current value for a property that you specify when you use the *Name* parameter, located in a path that you specify with either the *Path* or *LiteralPath* parameters.
trans-unit.target: **Get ItemPropertyValue** 获取用于指定当您使用的属性的当前值 *名称* 参数，位于与指定的路径 *路径* 或 *LiteralPath* 参数。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get the value of the ProductID property
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 获取 ProductID 属性的值

trans-unit.source: This command gets the value of the ProductID property of the \SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion object in the Windows Registry provider.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在 Windows 注册表提供程序中获取 \SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion 对象的产品 id 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get the last write time of a file or folder
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 获取文件或文件夹的上次编写的时间

trans-unit.source: This command gets the value of the LastWriteTime property, or the last time a file or folder was changed, from the C:\Users\Test\Documents\ModuleToAssembly folder, working in the FileSystem provider.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取 LastWriteTime 属性的值或上一次一个文件或文件夹已更改，从文件系统提供程序中使用的 C:\Users\Test\Documents\ModuleToAssembly 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get multiple property values of a file or folder
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 获取文件或文件夹的多个属性的值

trans-unit.source: This command gets the values of the **LastWriteTime**, **CreationTime**, and **Root** properties of a folder.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取的值 **LastWriteTime**, ，**CreationTime**, ，和 **根** 文件夹的属性。

trans-unit.source: The property values are returned in the order in which you specified the property names.
trans-unit.target: 属性值中指定的属性名称的顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，例如由 Get-credential cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you are prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名时，系统会提示您输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers that are installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, an item or items that this cmdlet excludes from the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定作为一个字符串数组，此 cmdlet 将从该操作中排除的项或项。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 筛选器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供程序的格式或语言指定筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *路径* 参数。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcard characters, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 该筛选器，其中包括通配符字符的使用的语法取决于提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when the cmdlet gets the objects rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器是比其他参数更有效，因为提供程序将其应用该 cmdlet 将获取这些对象，而不是在检索后再由 Windows PowerShell 筛选对象。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, an item or items that this cmdlet includes in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定作为一个字符串数组，此 cmdlet 将在操作中包括的项或项。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path to the item property.
trans-unit.target: 指定指向项属性的路径。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to the *Path* parameter, the value of *LiteralPath* is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反 *路径* 参数、 的值 *LiteralPath* 完全按照其键入时，才使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the property or properties to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 指定要检索的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the item or items.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个或多个项的路径。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递一个字符串，包含此 cmdlet 的路径。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Boolean, System.String, System.DateTime
trans-unit.target: System.Boolean，System.String，System.DateTime

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns an object for each item property value that it gets.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将返回一个对象，用于获取每个项属性值。

trans-unit.source: The object type depends on the property value that is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 对象类型取决于检索的属性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a file system drive, the cmdlet might return a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在文件系统驱动器中，该 cmdlet 可能返回的文件或文件夹。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 旨在处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, run the Get-PSProvider cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请运行 Get-psprovider cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
